mapper.update: update orders set destination_name=#{destinationName}, destination_email=#{destinationEmail}, destination_zipcode=#{destinationZipcode}, destination_address=#{destinationAddress}, destination_tel=#{destinationTel}, delivery_time=#{deliveryTime}, payment_method=#{paymentMethod}, status=#{status}, order_date=#{orderDate}, total_price=#{totalPrice} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT o.id o_id, o.user_id o_user_id, status, total_price, order_date, destination_name, destination_email, destination_zipcode, destination_address, destination_tel, delivery_time, payment_method, oi.id oi_id, item_id, order_id, quantity, size, sub_total, i.id i_id, i.name i_name, description, i.price_m i_price_m, i.price_l i_price_l, image_path, deleted, ot.id ot_id, topping_id, order_item_id, t.id t_id, t.name t_name, t.price_m t_price_m, t.price_l t_price_l FROM orders AS o LEFT JOIN order_Items AS oi ON o.id=order_id LEFT JOIN items AS i ON item_id=i.id LEFT JOIN order_toppings AS ot ON oi.id=order_item_id LEFT JOIN toppings AS t ON topping_id=t.id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT o.id o_id, o.user_id o_user_id, status, total_price, order_date, destination_name, destination_email, destination_zipcode, destination_address, destination_tel, delivery_time, payment_method, oi.id oi_id, item_id, order_id, quantity, size, sub_total, i.id i_id, i.name i_name, description, i.price_m i_price_m, i.price_l i_price_l, image_path, deleted, ot.id ot_id, topping_id, order_item_id, t.id t_id, t.name t_name, t.price_m t_price_m, t.price_l t_price_l FROM orders AS o LEFT JOIN order_Items AS oi ON o.id=order_id LEFT JOIN items AS i ON item_id=i.id LEFT JOIN order_toppings AS ot ON oi.id=order_item_id LEFT JOIN toppings AS t ON topping_id=t.id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND o.status = #{status} ORDER BY o.id DESC,oi.id
